post.content:
PlayStation 5 unprecedented Returnal won’t hit its beforehand launched liberate date. Housemarque’s new third-particular person shooter will walk a bit later into the spring, with a brand new liberate date of April 30, Sony launched Thursday morning on the PlayStation Twitter account.
